net.casper.ext.swing

Class CDatasetTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • net.casper.ext.swing.CDatasetTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, TableModel

    public class CDatasetTableModel
extends AbstractTableModel
    A Swing GUI TableModel wrapper for a Casper dataset.
    Version:
    $Revision: 206 $
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Constructor Detail

      • CDatasetTableModel

        public CDatasetTableModel(net.casper.data.model.CDataCacheContainer cache)
                   throws IOException
        Construct a table model from the passed in dataset cache, sorting all rows by primary key ascending, displaying missing values as empty string, and non-editable.
        Parameters:
        cache - CDataCacheContainer to create table model for.
        Throws:
        IOException - if cache cannot be loaded

      • CDatasetTableModel

        public CDatasetTableModel(net.casper.data.model.CDataCacheContainer cache,
                  boolean sortByPrimaryKey,
                  boolean blankMissingValues,
                  boolean editable)
                   throws IOException
        Construct a table model from the passed in dataset cache. Table Models are constructed from a CDataCacheContainer and not a CDataRowSet because CDataRowSets are not thread safe.
        Parameters:
        cache - CDataCacheContainer to create table model for.
        sortByPrimaryKey - if true sort the rows by primary key ascending, otherwise use the cache's default order
        blankMissingValues - if true display empty string instead of the missing value
        editable - if table and underlying dataset can be edited
        Throws:
        IOException - if cache cannot be loaded
